Episode.GuestStars: Chris Dotson|Rachel Bilson|Monika Ramnath|Sanjay Chandani|Emy Coligado|Kevin Weisman
Episode.Overview: Chuck must learn to balance a real love life with his cover love life when he meets a charming young woman by the name of Lou. At the same time, his relationship with Sarah gets interesting when the duo must explain their sexual relations with Ellie and Captain Awesome on a double date. Meanwhile, there is trouble when someone is using truth poison in order to retrieve codes for nuclear facilities.
